metadata.title: CVE-2019-14247 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - medium.
metadata.description:
The scan() function in mad.c in mpg321 0.3.2 allows remote attackers to trigger an out-of-bounds write via a zero bitrate in an MP3 file.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo ua fix CVE-2019-14247` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

mpg321 - 0.3.2-2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: mpg321 package in impish, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '0.3.2-2').
